_description: A prayer on the election of an abbot — three monorhyming quatrains

BLCottFausCXII.First Lines: God iesus almiȝti kyngHelp ous nou at oure chysyng…
BLCottFausCXII.Last Lines: …And him yne lyf to wylleÞet he hys Saule naȝt spille
BLCottFausCXII.Note: Added to upper and lower margins of f. 31v.
BLCottFausCXII.Editions:
Thompson,  Sir Edward Maunde,
                        ed.  
             Customary of the Benedictine Monasteries of Saint Augustine,
                Canterbury….
         London: Henry Bradshaw Society, 1902. Vol. 1: Text of Cottonian ms.
            Faustia C. xii: 69.
